A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unfortunately the saga is heading in the wrong direction. Star Wars has never been known for its acting but the story has always been solid. The character development is terrible and predictable. I understand the need to usher in a new and younger cast\, but why completely destroy the old\, it seems they could have been a good supporting presence. Not enough darkness and too many cheesy scenes. The rebel series on Disney channel has better dialogue and back story. IMO.
